Package org.crsh.term.console

Class Summary
Console This class provides an abstraction for a console.
ConsoleReader The console reader provides read oriented operation for the console.
ConsoleWriter The console writer controls the output as seen by the client of the console.
ViewReader  
ViewWriter Perform client write.
